Class att.grappa.TableFieldPeer 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----att.grappa.TableFieldPeer
public class TableFieldPeer
extends Object
A class for drawing the TableField information of a Table. Specific DrawPane information is stored lower down at the TextLabelPeer level.

Version:
1.1, 30 Sep 1999; Copyright 1996 - 1999 by AT&T Corp.
Author:
John Mocenigo, Research @ AT&T Labs

TableFieldPeer(TableField)
Create an instance of a TableFieldPeer related to the supplied TableField.

TableFieldPeer 
 public TableFieldPeer(TableField tf)
Create an instance of a TableFieldPeer related to the supplied TableField.

Parameters:
tf - the source object for this peer object
